item.title: Holly add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment." -- Rumi

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "The only mistake you have made is asking the wrong question. It isn't about what you did wrong. It's what you have not yet done." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "I was afraid of the dance once, too. But I learned to embrace it and the mistakes I would make. Do not turn away from your fear. Turn toward love instead." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "The dance had distilled her and she had become one with the essence of all that is." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "Be willing to turn your attention to that which serves you." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "If you can love all who've betrayed you... you can taste sweetness in everything." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "No one is born beneath this dance. This dance gives birth to you." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "....it struck her that that perhaps everyone had the ability to see themselves in others. Even in the rocks. Even in the roses." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "Love was not the point and pity was a poor man's pride." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "She did not need anyone else's love when she had roses." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "You know you have received the invitation when your heart is ready to risk everything to hold the hand of God." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "....life is the work of the spirit trying to have a human experience." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "...purification was the point of such pain." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "Your transformation will be the miracle." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "...see the blessing and beauty that you are." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "Everything that has ever been beautiful has been burned. Like you." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "...lose your mind so that you can gain a new way of knowing." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "Purge everything that's holding you back. Whatever it is you feel you are being deprived of, trust the limitation serves to bring you more of what you want." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "...anyone looking for friends without faults shall remain friendless. The choice is yours." -- Holly Lynn Payne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Holly Lynn Payne
item.description: "The point is to turn your grief into love. The roses are helping you find grace." -- Holly Lynn Payne
